name: Planet Zuve (Demo)
description:
2534.... The A.L.T. Corporation discover a new Planet
They call it Planet Zuve . They detected a lot of gold on the surface. 

A ship with 50 people was sent to the planet to establish the first base.
During the landing the ship had an accident. 
You managed to get out with a rescue shuttle.

Now you are in the Plant and you have to save yourself , help your colleagues and find out what happens to the ship.

This is a DEMO version done for the https://itch.io/jam/scream-zone-jam-9 , it includes only the first level.

Music: Unseen Horrors by Kevin MacLeod

Link:  https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4569-unseen-horrors
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Graphics: Mauro Rilla
Some Aliens graphics made by Victroium (Discord: Victroium#1737)
